Today, Dan tells Jordan all about what happened on The Alex Jones Show on June 12th. Topics covered include:

*Dan's hypothetical plan for an interview with Alex Jones
*How desperate is Alex to do preemptive damage control about Megyn Kelly?
*Does Jerome Corsi have huge Seth Rich news? (he doesn't)
